ESCOM.IS.summary: Escort Teknoloji Yatirim A.S. provides technology products, solutions, and services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers including consumer electronics, including tablets, notebooks, cameras, external storage products, LCD and LED TVs, Blu-ray and DVD players, LED lighting products, sound systems, and projection devices. It also provides military systems, such as atom processor military computers; unmanned aerial vehicle communication, control, and image compression systems; ruggedized DVD and laser printers; laser threat warning receiver systems; power systems; regulators; and AC/DC laboratory power systems. In addition, the company offers image processing systems; retail payment systems; and telecommunications and network systems comprising modems, routers and switches, switching systems, and data and power distribution systems, as well as provides network solutions and banking systems. Further, it provides various solutions that include automation, channel management system, merchandising management system, warehouse management system, service management system, E-invoice sending/receiving, archiving of e-invoice, SMS gateway, call center solutions, IVR and IVN solutions, voice over Internet protocol, data center, Internet service provider, and virtual telephone solutions. Additionally, the company offers live support; social media monitoring, analysis, and technology supply; inbound and outbound call center customer, telesales and telemarketing, collections and payment reminders, customer satisfaction surveys, information calls, technical support, and back office; football statistics and analysis; media monitoring and reporting; merchandising management; and TV screen graphics software and operation services. It also provides consulting, planning, design, installation, maintenance, and repair services for renewable energy systems. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
